DOC.brief_summary: Can nicotinamide riboside ( 750 mg/day 12 week ) affect level NAD+ brain measure 31P MRS ?
DOC.brief_title: Use 31P MRS Assess Brain NAD+ Healthy Collegiate Football Players
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy collegiate football player take Nicotinamide Riboside ( NR ) placebo twice daily 84 day . Pre- post-intervention evaluation include physical assessment , blood test safety toxicity monitoring , blood test biomarkers , neurologic testing , quality life questionnaire , 31P MRI exam .
DOC.criteria: Adult male collegiate football player History least 1 year playing experience collegiate level Body mass index ( estimate base height weight ) 23 37 Willing provide inform consent , ingest test substance , provide blood specimen Willing comply study instruction maintain current level physical activity throughout study History loss consciousness 5 minute Contraindications Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) , implant medical device , metal object , pacemaker History epilepsy History 3 concussion History headache precede concussion History depression precede concussion History developmental delay Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) History posttraumatic seizure History complex spine and/or skull trauma
